net.peierls.puzzle

Class BfsPuzzleSolver<T extends PuzzleState<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.peierls.puzzle.FilteredPuzzleSolver<T>
      • net.peierls.puzzle.BfsPuzzleSolver<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PuzzleSolver<T>

    public class BfsPuzzleSolver<T extends PuzzleState<T>>
extends FilteredPuzzleSolver<T>
    Breadth-first-search puzzle solver.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BfsPuzzleSolver()
      Constructs a BFS solver with an exact filter.
      BfsPuzzleSolver(Supplier<PuzzleStateFilter<T>> filterSupplier)
      Constructs a BFS solver that will use a Bloom filter for states that support it, otherwise an exact filter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Optional<T> solutionState(T initialState, PuzzleStateFilter<T> filter)
      Concrete subclasses must implement this method to find a solution from the given initial state, using the given state filter.

        filterState, solution, successors
